long_description: The SRAM force brakes are the only brakes strong enough to control the Force gruppo. They are designed with light weight, high performance and streamlined aesthetics in mind. Dual Pivot design increases braking power and enhances progressive feel. Features cold-forged arms and stainless-steel main pivot bolts. Also features proprietary pad compound and adjustable cartridge holders. Powerful return springs ensure positive engagement and release. Indexed quick-release.
short_description: The SRAM force brakes are the only brakes strong enough to control the Force gruppo. They are designed with light weight, high performance and streamlined aesthetics in mind.
